meanings.definition: The basic principles or essential elements of a subject or skill.
meanings.sent1: Understanding the fundamentals of math is crucial for solving complex problems.
meanings.sent2: She studied the fundamentals of music theory before starting to play an instrument.
meanings.sent3: The magician's trick failed because he forgot the fundamentals of sleight of hand.
meanings.sent4: Just like a building needs strong fundamentals, a good education requires a solid foundation in the basics.
meanings.sent5: Learning the fundamentals of a language is like unlocking the key to a new world.

meanings.definition: A foundational or essential aspect of something.
meanings.sent1: Good communication is one of the fundamentals of a successful relationship.
meanings.sent2: The fundamentals of a healthy lifestyle include proper nutrition and regular exercise.
meanings.sent3: The team's victory was attributed to their strong grasp of the fundamentals of the game.
meanings.sent4: In business, understanding the fundamentals of marketing can lead to increased sales and growth.
meanings.sent5: The fundamentals of democracy are based on principles of equality and freedom for all citizens.
